extendedInfo.description: This application easily and quickly enables WiFi Tethering hotspot AP in 1-Click. It supports most Android phones, including the lastest Jelly Bean devices!Use it to get Internet connection on Windows, Mac, another phone or tablet, Ubuntu, Wii, PS3 and a lot more, everywhere. One of our users use it in the woods and dance with xBox live! What a wonderful portable party!Perhaps the world's fastest, cleanest and lightest app for launching WiFi hotspot. We have reduced the app size to almost nothing.It does NOT require root access.If you want a secured connection with password protection, or be able to customize your hotspot AP name, please download the pro version here:http://goo.gl/XUpqYOr search "1-Click WiFi Tether Pro" in the store.Important: If this works on your unrooted device, please don't accept system updates, otherwise this application will be banned and will not be compatible with your new system any more. The only solution then should be to root your beloved phone. Its purpose is to avoid and replace the standard manual configuration, which requires at least 5 clicks everytime you need to start WiFi tethering, which might also ask you to enter some text to configure the WiFi hotspot.If you use this application, you only need 1 click without entering anything. We have tested it mainly with European carriers. It works on most devices with Android 2.2 or higher. Whether it works is really carrier or device specific. Please do not give it a bad rating. Thanks:)Possible reasons if it doesn't work :1. Your operator doesn't support WiFi tethering and blocks it on purpose.2. Your phone's 3G connection is too weak.3. Your system ROM had been modified by the manufacturer4. You don't have a data plan on your SIM cardRobot fans, home automation lovers, geeks or Android developers, please visit our blog:http://www.diyphonegadgets.comâââââ ScottyB Apr 9 Galaxy Nexus5 star for first try! Finally found one that works great. I have a Motorola with Gingerbread 2.3.4 with Vodafone carrier in Spain. Worked perfect on first try.âââââ Massimo Jan 22 Galaxy NexusFantastiko. I am not the types who rate an app but this is really worth it.âââââ Wayne Mar 10 Huawei Att ImpulseI've tried several ways of tether and have failed each and every time with this wonderful app I've been able to tether my laptop wii and xbox360 successfuly great jobâââââ prashant Mar 9 LG Pecanworks with my psp and ps3 no problem at all especially easy to use. i tried every app in the market none worked but this one worked pretty awesome love itâââââ Daniel Jun 16, 2012 Moto Photon 4GTried this wifi app on my Non-Rooted phone, had my PS Vita Hooked up using my Sprint 4g service. reviews.title: Amazing work!
reviews.comment: I spent weeks! Literally weeks people.. just trying to find a tether option so my hubby could access the internet on his old phone. And finally j found this! Best app  I have found. Paying for full version than you darlings keep up this sneaky work(;
reviews.author: Jenny Bee

reviews.title: Works, but not continuous.
reviews.comment: Free version works, but seems to disconnect about every 10 minutes.  Not sure if its intended (since it is free) or if it is a programming bug.  Hopefulky developer will support and enhancr with time.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Parrett

reviews.title: Great tether app!
reviews.comment: I love it! I have searched for weeks for this! Now, I have found it and it works great# I have already recommended it to multiple friends!
reviews.author: Toby Gill

reviews.title: Works well on Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: After I just turned it off It shouldn\'t turn on Wi-Fi automatically.  Sometimes it turns back on the hot-spot.
reviews.author: Tach Sirichai

reviews.title: SUCKS
reviews.comment: THIS WORKED A FEW DAYS ON MY 3DS UNTIL NOW THIS IS CRAP UNINSTALLED THEN REINSTALLED BUT STILL ITS NOT WORKING UNINTALLED AGAIN (FOR REAL AND FOR GOOD)
reviews.author: Ryan Garcia

reviews.title: Super helpful
reviews.comment: This app was super helpful for me. I needed the ability to tether while traveling in Europe with a pre-paid plan. My unlocked US phone had problems turning on tethering without my AT&T sim. This app solved my problem.
reviews.author: Paul Oremland

reviews.title: Great I think
reviews.comment: I remember downloading this app for the Skyrocket a while back and it didn\'t work. But I just relayed it through tor and it works great!
reviews.author: Russell Barker

reviews.title: Good free app
reviews.comment: App is an actual free one and not just claiming to be like most others and works on my network unlocked Galaxy Note 2 without any rooting. Great app that does as advertised
reviews.author: Matthew Hernandez

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: I was a user of open garden wifi hotspot,  but It won\'t work even on my rooted s3. I needed to get my laptop on the internet in a hurry and this app did the trick. Can do almost everything except show data usage and throughout. Taking away one star for that.
reviews.author: Sunil Mujumdar

reviews.title: Pretty good wifi app
reviews.comment: I have a 3g phone, so it\'s nice to be able to enjoy wifi while gaming, nothing else would work and this is quite conveint
reviews.author: Khari Sanders

reviews.title: A life-saver
reviews.comment: This app is great. For the longest time I was needing a way to access the internet on my tablet at work, but all of the options seemed like they needed a rooted phone. Fortunately this one required no root and was very easy to set up. Thankfully I currently have unlimited data or I\'d be getting major overage charges
reviews.author: Clayton Cantwell

reviews.title: Best App for playing ps3 online
reviews.comment: I recently Moved and didnt have Internet anymore i have a Metro PCS zte 4g phone i contacted Metro to Upgrade my plan to be able to use th\303\251 mobile hotspot feature but because I had unlimited data plan I could not add hotspot to my phone. BS.... I downloaded this FREE App n WAALAAH just like that Im Back playing  ps3 Online with no lag. N they were gonna charge me 10$  a month extra . this App Works period 100% Im Online playing Black Ops 2 on ps3 through my phone
reviews.author: Jason Jones

reviews.title: Works Great on Nexus 4
reviews.comment: Working great over here. Easy to use. No problems. I\'m about to upgrade to Pro. Absolutely worth the money especially with being able to bypass the extra money your carrier would normally charge you every month to use this hotspot feature. If you have unlimited data, this app is a God send.
reviews.author: Jonathan Irons

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This is he only tethering that works for me and it works very well great job!!!
reviews.author: Charles Fiorille

reviews.title: S4 free tethering
reviews.comment: Seems good, give it a test run and will prob purchase full version in future if it keeps running smooth on my S4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: app is awesome again whatever you\'re doing you\'re doing it right
reviews.author: Allen Cantrell

reviews.title: So Far So Good
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy S4 on ATT Network.  Technical Support Analyst by trade.     The free version of this app. works perfectly. Did not try staying connected for more than 10 min. yet. Reviews state that could be an issue. Also heard that The Pro version has speed and connectivity issues, when encrypted,  so not buying it just yet. So far though I love it! Will stay tuned to see how the future updates resolve some of these concerns.
reviews.author: John Weber

reviews.title: good but...
reviews.comment: doesn\'t allow me to save the settings on my network, such as even the name. allow us to change settings please, but otherwise good app
reviews.author: Brian Chou

reviews.title: Wifi works.
reviews.comment: Enables hotspot service perfectly on my Galaxy S4 on AT&T. It allows me to enjoy my 4G LTE and HSPA+ on a laptop or any other WiFi device. The only reason it doesn\'t get 5 stars is due to the inability to add passworded security.
reviews.author: Charles Duoto

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love it! Thank you!
reviews.author: Astrid Turner
